channel.title: I never really knew how they
channel.description:
How do people post on here when it still says "Has To Take Quiz"? I'm sorry its a bit [i][b]off-topic[b][/i], but its always been a concern to me. I tried posting w/o taking the quiz, but I guess I'm not as smart to come up with something like they do. =\ I don't know if this is against the rules, because all the rules say are you can't discuss answers to the quiz. Please correct me if I'm wrong.
Help is appreciated, - Thanks :)
°º¤ø,¸¸,ø¤º°`°º¤ø,¸ [b]Play N Skillz[/b] °º¤ø,¸¸,ø¤º°`°º¤ø,¸ [br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2007, 05:29:53 PM[/size][hr]I'm sorry for double-post, but no one ever answers my pending question. I would really appreciate it if someone said anything... :(

item.title: I never really knew how they

item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Haha keep searching.

item.title: I never really knew how they
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

InternalorExternalCommand:

tbh, it would suck having it say “Has to take quiz” Under your name the rest of your time on mopar.

Yup, it would. But for some, they like it. I would really want to find out the answer though.
“There can only be one highlander!!!” .

Read full topic

item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Well, thanks alot for a reply. That’s all that really matters. On the most part of that, usually, I don’t even get replies. Thanks again, but I will still strive for the answer.

item.title: I never really knew how they
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

I have no idea how to get past the quiz and keep posting. Maybe they like log out then log back in to get around the quiz. So then it just says it, for the rest of the time they use that account. hehe…that sucks

Read full topic
